headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC) Margin Beat Reinforces Bullish Case Despite Balance Sheet Concerns
summary: Norfolk Southern (NSC) posted net profit margins of 24.2% in its latest results, up from 19.8% a year earlier. Earnings grew 22.6% over the past year, easily outpacing its five-year average annual growth of 1.3%. Looking ahead, revenue is forecast to increase 3.8% per year and earnings are expected to rise 5.6% annually, though both figures are projected to trail the broader US market. For investors, these results highlight strengthened profitability and a recent upswing in growth performance...
